channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Space Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Spectrum Protect for Space Management

item.title: CVE-2018-1882|2024-09-17T00:20:45.091Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20for%20space%20management
item.description: In a certain atypical IBM Spectrum Protect 7.1 and 8.1 configurations, the node password could be displayed in plain text in the IBM Spectrum Protect client trace file. IBM X-Force ID: 151968.

item.title: CVE-2021-29672|2024-09-17T01:21:21.614Z -- ibm -- spectrum%20protect%20for%20space%20management
item.description: IBM Spectrum Protect Client 8.1.0.0-8 through 1.11.0 is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when processing the current locale settings. A local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges or cause the application to crash. IBM X-Force ID: 199479
